发生意外错误\n抱歉，给您带来不便 重新启动 错误日志 错误详情 错误信息 复制日志 关闭\ 时 分 秒
确定 取消 下一步 上一步 请选择开始时间 请选择结束时间
Navigation parameters Navigation parameters set Save Navigation loop Return automatically Return along the paths Robot plans the route to complete the task loop when end point and starting point are not the same position Move from start point to end point and back to the start point consider as one time, suitable for smaller scenes Way turn Point turning Arc turning Reach the point then rotate, suitable for narrow scenes If the path has corners, robot calculates the turning radius to improves the efficiency, suitable for large scenes Speed down distance When the distance between robot and obstacle is less than this value, robot speeds down Stop distance When the distance between the robot and the obstacle is less than or equal to this value, robot stops Reset parameter
Automatic charging Automatic charging set Turn on automatic charging When battery power is lower than trigger value, robot returns to autocharge Power trig autocharge Power stop autocharge ON OFF
Sensor configuration Ultrasonic configuration When sonar is triggered in static mode, the robot will stop moving Be sure you have known the installation position before setting, the ultrasonic value is 0 means the function is closed IMU temperature It is recommended to set about 10℃ higher than the space
Hardware detection Hardware name Self-test results Self-test time Self-test Lidar Dual cameras Embedded system Normal Abnormal Self-tested
